ygData.subject: Ramblings While the Servers are Down
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello all, yes I ve been around. Checking the boards from time to time. EQ so far has been pretty good, I m wining lottos like crazy in the game. (lotto is:
ygData.messageBody:
Hello all, yes I've been around. Checking the
boards from time to time. EQ so far has been pretty
good, I'm wining lottos like crazy in the game. (lotto
is: When an item is found the group randoms the item
between the people who are in for the item. /ran 1 6) Ive
pulled off some amazing luck. In one day I aquired a
Cloak of Shadows (AC12 +12dex +10poison Wt0.0-not more
than 15 of these on the entire server) and a Short
Sword of the Ykesha (Damage8 Delay24 Wt4.5 and casts
"Ykesha" randomly for 75 damage on the monster you are
fighting) But just letting you all know whats going on in
Kaylin World over here. See you all in EQ!<br><br>Kaylin
Danmor 48th (pixels away from 49)Bard on the Mithaniel
Marr server
